channel.title: openQSE
channel.description: The goal is for openQSE to be a unified initiative to bring together vendors, collaborators, labs and universities in building an open community.

item.title: Sample blog post to learn markdown tips
item.dc:creator: Bill Smith
item.description: There's lots to learn! - This is a demo post to show you how to write blog posts with markdown. I strongly encourage you to take 5 minutes to learn how to write in markdown - itâ€™ll teach you how to transform regular text into bold/italics/tables/etc.I also encourage you to look at the code that...
